sentences.sContent: The diagram implanted a dangerous prejudice firmly in the minds of countless economics students.
sentences.sCn: 该图表在无数经济学学生的头脑中牢牢地灌输了一种危险的偏见。

phrases.pCn: 人工耳蜗；耳蜗植入；耳郭灌输治疗

remMethod.val: im(进入) + plant(种植) → 植入； 灌输

trans.tranOther: to strongly fix an idea, feeling, attitude etc in someone’s mind or character
